title: League Client Crashes/Constant High Ping
body:
Issue #1
I have been having this problem for quite sometime now. League of legends Client keeps crashing at random times without me doing much of anything, even when I'm just trying to look at my profile or even match history and even during the loading screen of games of any game mode.
I have uninstalled and re-downloaded League multiple times my windows 10 is completely up to date i have 0 viruses and yet i have not found the reason for any of these issues...
Issue #2
6.1 and after i have had constant high ping that sits around 250ms(first world problems) after about 4:30pm PST until about 2am PST and I have called my internet provider(Suddenlink) to see if it was a problem with MY end of wired/wireless connection and they have sent many techs and  have said multiple times that my set up isn't at fault... I even had one of the most recent techs place all my router ports to the specifics of league ports and it doesnt help.
Please if anyone has any information regarding these issues please comment

replies.body:
THIS IS A SUDDENLINK issue. RIOT needs to contact them because all suddenlink does is DENY DENY DENY. they have no care for their customers. and for people like me who has no other ISP options we need someone big to stand up for us. RIOT REACH OUT TO SUDDENLINK THIS IS BS.

They are CROOKS if you ask me.

When you say crashes, can you provide more details on what you mean?  For example, are you receiving any error messages and what does it say?  Crashes in general could be due to a few reasons like outdated drivers, bad game files, or third party programs like play.tv.  High ping would be more of a network sisue having problems maintaining a steady connection.  For this, I suggest using our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide as your first step.  Let me know if you have any questions and additional information!

I don't get an "error message" or anything like that, the League client randomly closes without giving me any warning/reasoning/error messages. I do mean the client crashes, since it closes the client with me still having to go to task manager to force close or reopen another client to force close the previous client. and this happens at random quite a few times a day at different times during the day.
As well as i have have seen the connection issues guide and i tried most if not all and nothing has helped.
I am having the exact same issue with suddenlink ^ and it is very frustrating.
